column5: My daughter and I headed up to Lakair for the first time ever a couple weeks ago to meet up with some friends it was a blast and sure was alot of fun its to bad I am not able to get up there in june but our musky event here keeps me from heading up but I must say the bugs were alot better this time of year rather then in June no black flies or little picky blood suckers. We were only there for two nights but well worth the drive up it was very nice to see my old friends again and get to visit some for the first time we even managed a few fis hfor the short time we did go fishing but that was not teh reason to get up there here are a couple pics from the weekend     my Daughter with a new friend the inch worm she let him go by the tree  :cheers:    not sure how this got up there I thought the wife was at home but maybe her boyfriend stole my boat and headed up with out us :???:      Oh yea we did get some fish also  my daughter with a perch then a pike       my daughter and I with a 19" LM    Me and a 26" pickerel   and a very awesome way to finish off a night out and a weekend away
VERY nice!   Well worth the drive!
Mike...great report.  Everytime I see you in a report you are being a great Dad, hat's off to you Mike. It shows the quality person that you are.  Nice pics and smiles.
Great report and pics MrEh  Look like you guys had fun up there!  Very nice eye and thanks for sharing Leechman
That's a nice pickerel Mike.  Looks like you and your daughter had a wonderul time.  Great sunset pic too.  Thanks for the report.  Joey

A really great report Mike. Wonderful pictures and nice fish too. Glad you had a good time up there. You were certainly in the cadillac of all fishing boats. Don's is one of the nicest fishing boats I think I've ever seen.  Thanks for posting that...beauty for sure.
Mike is was a real pleasure meeting you and your daughter, she is a real sweety  The last pic looks very familiar
nice  post some pics of that boat!
Thats an impressive LM bass from Lakair. And a nice pickerel. Some very nice pickerel have been caught at Lakair this year. Thanks for sharing.
great report, looks like the kid had fun....thanks for sharing...PS...thats a nice walleye.
Great report those are some nice fish great way to spend time with your daughter  Rob
Good report and pics!!!  Looks like y'all had fun!
What everybody else said.  OK, I will say it also, great report and pictures.
Some nice fish!
Glad ya's had a good time, good fishing, good company, can't beat it...
Great report Mike.  Times like that spent with your daughter are times she will never forget
Nothing beats Daddy and Daughter time! Looks like the both of you had a great time with some nice fish whick is always a bonus. Thanks for the report.  Cheers, 1leg
Great report!  I hope my daughter is still interested as she gets older!!  Looked like a great time...awesome pics too.
Great Report!!

thanks everyone I sure do love getting out with my daughter we have alot of fun fishing together next year I will have the whole family with me the wife will have to get some time off so we can make a week of it in Aug next year.  Roy you are right that boat is one nice ride and makes for some comfy fishing with them bench seats and better seats up front then my Freightliner has you cant go wrong.  It would be nice to one day get up there for June but like I said we are booked for teh next??? how many years with MCI.

Sweet report Mike always enjoy young kids taking part in fishing my kids like it alot but the 13 year old is losing interest  Thankfully the 2 younger children like fishing.  Can't we to go there next June
looks like every one had a great time nice bass and wally
